nodes.text: The Siren Sea was a sea on Parnassos that was near Terpsichore Station, a Con Star Mining Corporation outpost that was home to a large mine. The Siren Sea was a popular tourist destination before the Devastation of Parnassos and was said to be a tram ride away from Terpsichore. It was said to have clear waters and beautiful shores. During the New Republic Era, Phasma speculated that the name of her tribe Scyre was derived from the word Siren Sea while watching a Con Star educational video.
